locale.name: en_US
locale.message: The phpAdsNew plugin allows dynamic ads from phpAdsNew site to be inserted into ojs.
The phpAdsNew plugin allows dynamic ads from phpAdsNew site to be inserted into OJS. Please read the README file in plugins/generic/phpAdsNew for information on enabling this plugin.
Use this form to select the phpAdsNew ad zones that will be displayed in OJS for each potential location.
The configuration file, {$filename}, could not be accessed.

At least one of the required phpAdsNew configuration parameters could not be read from the configuration file. The required parameters are dbhost, dbuser, dbpassword, dbname, url_prefix, and table_prefix.
Unable to connect to the PhpAdsNew database.
